definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: Commentary Phraseology is one of the most distinct phraseologies in Chinese language vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 品評用語是漢語言詞彙中最具特色的用語之一。

sentences.english: Methods Defluorided brick-tea was sensuously judged and its physical and chemical components were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法感官品評與理化成分分析相結合。

sentences.english: Foreign food is sampled and discussed.
sentences.chinese: 可以品嚐到外國食物，然後相互品評一下。

sentences.english: They have commented on the famous school and writer of poetic circles in the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 對明代詩壇上著名的流派和作家都進行了品評。

definition: appreciation of the finer things in life
can be enjoyed by scholars and lay-people alike (idiom)
to be equal to/to be well-matched/rival
